title: My friend has created his Dr. Mundo rework concept
body:
Hey guys (and gals!)

My friend has created a Dr. Mundo rework concept and he wanted to share it with the world. As he is unable to post on Boards due to too low level, I want to relay his message to you.

Any feedback or messages of support for his artwork are welcome!

> Hello everyone ðŸ™‚

> When I started playing League a few years ago, the first champion that I played and my favorite till this day is Dr. Mundo.
Since there was a vote pool about 2 months ago for Zaun champion rework, Mundo did not win his rework so I decided to try and do rework myself. I imagined Mundo as this colossal monster that roams around dark valleys of Zaun. I got a lot of my inspiration from characters such as Jack the Ripper. The idea was to present him as some sort of mix between Hulk and Jack the Ripper ( long coat, colossal body, veins, ripping clothes and of course his iconic cleaver.) "Mundo goes where he pleases".

> Dr. Mundo is the property of Riot Games, I do not own rights to this character, this is fan art.

> Rito pls rework my man Mundo T T

> Hope you guys like him. ðŸ™‚


concept by Ivan ÄuÄ‘ar 

You can find him drawing all sorts of games related stuff on Instagram @[dudidraws](https://www.instagram.com/dudidraws)

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
He kinda reminds me of a combination of Jack the Ripper and Frankenstein's Monster. I gotta say, this one is actually one of the very best Dr. Mundo rework concepts I have seen to this point (and I am searching the interwebs alot for it, mind you).

__________________

The clothing style and this big, towering bodyshape are really great, imo. He feels unnerving, I can imagine people getting terrorised by encountering him in the depths of Zaun. The only critique I have is that his head, which is _tiny_ compared to the rest of his model, looks a bit ridiculous. But since Dr. Mundo has to keep some weird stuff about him, I think that is actually fine.

I am in **love** with the syringe glove. It's something that makes him more of a dr. and not just some insane maniac with a cleaver. Syringes are something that I want a champion to utilise for quite some time now and I think giving them Dr. Mundo is the right call, since the syringe that got stuck in his shoulder has been iconic for him and this is a way to homage it.

You can be proud, my dude, this work is truly amazing.
The syringe glove is great since, for his ultimate, he could inject himself with it to get the super regen.

Hey there!
I very like this concept rework for Mundo,especially the design with his face,it's look very psychopathic as it must be!

But there is my question,how his E works? it's something what improve his next AA,or it just work when you are click the enemy?
And how his ult works?because i don't get it...

About the Q i don't know,it's kinda boring by my opinion,for that i have an idea!


There is two options how to use it:

First cast:Mundo chage his next AA.When Mundo hits an enemy champion/minion/tower he will deal physical damage,something like Darius W/Garen Q/Trundle Q/Illaoi W.

Hold on:Mundo throw his cleaver on one direction.If it hits an enemy champion/minion/monster it will deal physical damage.


What do you think about it?

I like your idea of Q, it needs some improvement, my idea was pretty much the same as his current Q.

Idea was to slow enemies with Q or cleaver toss, then get close to them so you can inject them with your W and give them sort of "debuff" that allows you to heal more from your basics. E is sort of the same thing like Warwick e, gives you shield and on second cast fears enemies. 

Ultimate gives him speed and health reg as does the current Ult, but gives him attack speed and cone attack pattern like Titanic Hydra has. I imagined him like some psycho on killing spree that runs and slashes everything in his path.

I have a good idea about his passive,and interactions....or maybe even about his lore.

That actually looks amazing! I donâ€™t know about the fear on E though, Iâ€™d think keeping the same ability he has now, but making himself visually actually light himself on fire would be terrifying.
Lighting himself on fire sounds sick man, i should have put that to his E. :D

The only abilities Mundo absolutely has to keep are his Q and his ult. Otherwise you can do whatever you want with him as long as he still has carry potential. That said, I'd rather not have Mundo's E be a carbon copy of Warwick's E.
I absolutely love the VGU, but was expecting to see a kit suggestion too. Still, I do like that your friend actually managed to actually make him look like the Madman of Zaun.

I feel like the needles on his hand are a bit off theme and make him look more like a mechanical predator than a madman

And his figure for his ultimate needs a bit more of a distinction since a slight size increase and a few green veins will be nearby imposdible to pick out during a teamfight (though maybe sound would be a giveaway) and the effect is kinda similar to singed who gains ms, defences, ap andana regeneration. It's basically the same but with different stat gains.
I wouldn't say so. They look like they're filled with serum so he can juice himself up on the go.

Thanks for the feedback guys, really means a lot.
Regarding his abilities and kit, i didn't put in enough effort in planing that as i should, most of it went to his visual, i see him as a hulking scientist with some of mechanical parts like Warwick since they are both from Zaun, like they did some experiments on him and stuff.
I am still an amateur artist and any feedback i get i appreciate.
Thanks again guys. :)
